bits

Interface IProblem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<IClause>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlternativeDenial, BitAnder, BitArrayPartition, BitArraySingleClearer, BitArraySingleSetter, BitEqualityIndicator, BitEqualizer, BitExclusiveSelector, BitFixer, BitInequalityIndicator, BitNander, BitNoter, BitOrderer, BitOrer, BitShefferStroker, BitUnequalizer, BitXnorer, BitXorer, ClauseDenier, ConditionalConjunction, ConditionalDisjunction, Conjunction, Disjunction, ExclusiveDisjunction, FredkinGater, Problem, ProblemBitLinker, ProblemDenier, ProblemDifferencer, ThreeBitAdder, ToffoliGater, TwoBitAdder

    public interface IProblem
extends java.lang.Iterable<IClause>
    The IProblem interface must be implemented by any class definition of Problem contemplated as an alternative to the Problem class provided by this package.
    Since:
    2004/08/26
    Version:
    1.4
    Author:
    Kerry Michael Soileau

    email: ksoileau2@yahoo.com

    website: http://kerrysoileau.com/index.html
